QueryViewSpec.Name: Child Project Registered Children Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Provides support for querying to find the children registered to a Child Project.
QueryViewSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL:
select FIELDOFFICEID as ID, so.ID SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID, so.LOOKUPID CHILDLOOKUPID, so_child.NAME, ch_ext.REGISTRATIONDATE, so_child.AGE, so_child.GENDER, dbo.UFN_DATE_FROMFUZZYDATE (so_child.BIRTHDATE) BIRTHDATE, -- so.AVAILABILITY, -- so.ELIGIBILITY, case when dbo.UFN_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY_ACTIVESPONSORSHIPS(so.ID) > 0 then 'Sponsored' when AVAILABILITYCODE = 1 then 'Unsponsored - Reserved' else 'Unsponsored' end as SPONSORSHIPSTATUS, so_reserveprocess.NAME as RESERVATIONKEY
from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD so_child on so.ID = so_child.ID left join dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION ch_ext on so.ID = ch_ext.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID left join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYRESERVEPROCESS so_reserveprocess on so_reserveprocess.ID = so.RESERVATIONKEYID left join dbo.SPONSORSHIPLOCATION slocation ON slocation.ID = so.SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONID
